name: Oakworks Spa Wellness
descr:
Maximum luxury with on-demand ergonomic excellence, OAKWORKS all electric Celesta Deluxe caters to the physical needs of any staff member while providing world-class spa-caliber comfort to your clients. Plus, with superior versatility to support and enormous menu of bodywork styles and esthetician services, theres no limit to what can accomplish.

Length: 180 cm. Width: 73 or 78 cm. Height Range: 61 - 88 cm.

Operates with dual motor, 2 foot controls and 1 hand control.
